A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I absolutely loved this movie and it exceeded my expectations. It plays on the theme of dealing with failure and letting go of the past.

There are some SJW moments that will make you roll your eyes but they're brief and have nothing to do with the overall plot.  Finally we have a Star Wars movie that feels different while still feeling like Star Wars.

Unlike Force Awakens\, I left the theater feeling like I was fulfilled rather than feeling empty and left with questions that I could care less about. Without giving out too much spoilers\, Last Jedi answers those questions in a way that makes the most sense.
